credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Design for Stage Curtain: Temple of Fame
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on wove paper.
description: Vertical Rectangle. Variation of design 3181. Putto raises tablet with inscription "METAS" [tasio]  near monument at left. No hermae shown, but upon entablature lie wreaths and frieze inscribed with names "ORFEO, CIMAROSA, ARISTOFANE, GOLDONI, SOFFOCLE, ALFIERI." Inscription below: "Teatro delle muse."
name: Drawing
